All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CANbus_Controller
 
CANbus_Driver
This Class implements an abstraction layer that allows to send/receive bytes to/from the connected devices via CANbus.
CANbus_Protocol
This Protocol is an abstraction layer that allows to interaction with any of the supported device via the given hardware peripheral.
CANbusDataReader
 
DeviceId
Class containing static final String constants representing device IDs for CANbus communication.
Driver
This Interface represent an abstraction layer that allows to send/receive bytes to/from the connected devices.
The Driver manage the interaction with the given hardware peripheral connected to the host device.
InstructionCANbus
 
Log
Singleton class for managing and saving log data.
MainApplication
Main entry point for the CANbusDEMO application.
MainViewController
The MainViewController class controls the main view of the CANbusDEMO application.
Notifiable
 
Protocol
LEVEL 1 contains all the methods in order to control the interaction with the given device connected to the host via one of the supported hardware peripheral.
Two known Protocol are used at moment: the RS232 and the CANbus.
This Protocol is an abstraction layer that allows to interact with any of the supported device via the given hardware peripheral.
